00041 void RangeServerClient::load_range(struct sockaddr_in &addr, TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log, RangeState &range_state, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00042   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::create_request_load_range(table, range, transfer_log, range_state));
00043   send_message(addr, cbp, handler);
00044 }
00045 
00046 void RangeServerClient::load_range(struct sockaddr_in &addr, TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, const char *transfer_log, RangeState &range_state) {
00047   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00048   EventPtr event_ptr;
00049   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::create_request_load_range(table, range, transfer_log, range_state));
00050   send_message(addr, cbp, &sync_handler);
00051   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00052     HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00053              String("RangeServer load_range() failure : ") + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00054 }

00081 void RangeServerClient::create_scanner(struct sockaddr_in &addr, TableIdentifier &table, RangeSpec &range, ScanSpec &scan_spec, ScanBlock &scan_block) {
00082   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00083   EventPtr event_ptr;
00084   CommBufPtr cbp(RangeServerProtocol::create_request_create_scanner(table, range, scan_spec));
00085   send_message(addr, cbp, &sync_handler);
00086   if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00087     HT_THROW((int)Protocol::response_code(event_ptr),
00088              String("RangeServer create_scanner() failure : ") + Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr));
00089   else {
00090     HT_EXPECT(scan_block.load(event_ptr) == Error::OK, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00091   }
00092 }

00204 
00208 void RangeServerClient::send_message(struct sockaddr_in &addr, CommBufPtr &cbp, DispatchHandler *handler) {
00209   int error;
00210   time_t timeout = (m_timeout == 0) ? m_default_timeout : m_timeout;
00211 
00212   m_timeout = 0;
00213   if ((error = m_comm->send_request(addr, timeout, cbp, handler)) != Error::OK) {
00214     HT_WARNF("Comm::send_request to %s:%d failed - %s",
00215                 inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr), ntohs(addr.sin_port), Error::get_text(error));
00216     HT_THROW(error, String("Comm::send_request to ") + inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr) + ":" + ntohs(addr.sin_port) + " failed");
00217   }
00218 }
